#summary Subversion Tips
#labels Dev-Help

=== ignore ==

Edit your $HOME/.subversion/config: find '`global-ignores`' and add '`*.pyc`'
{{{
global-ignores = *.pyc
}}}

To ignore specific files in the current directory:
{{{
$ svn propedit svn:ignore .
}}}
and add items list
{{{
*.tmp
*.log
}}}



=== keywords ===

To set CVS style tag:
{{{
$ svn propset svn:keywords "Id" <file>
}}}
then "$Id$" tags in <file> get automatically replaced.
